::Perndabot::

Perndabot looks down at Darkfate as the Predacon commander lands. 
Perndabot was used to looking down at bots. To his knowledge, he was 
the tallest bot on the planet, although in reality there were a few 
who were taller. Perndabot was 15 feet tall, a fuze of two Maximals 
and thereby having two fully operational sparks. Other than that, 
however, everything had been redone by the Alliance, right down to 
his programming. Before he was tamed (he had gone insane after the 
accidental fuze), he had been a completely wild bot, and it had taken 
the combined efforts of most of the Alliance and Maximals (which were 
both small factions at the time) to restrain him.

"Yes," he replies to Darkfate's question, "Zardus thinks it would be 
benificial to both factions if we allied. He would be here himself, 
but the Alliance just got back from a battle and there are things 
than need to be done back at the base."

His mission wasn't all or nothing. As long as any sort of good will 
was established between the Alliance and the Predacons, Zardus would 
probably be happy.

the 
> distance. One landed in Darkfate's arm.
> 
> "So, does Zardus want to make a deal with me?"
